title: Erika Jayne: A Hustlin’ Trophy Housewife or a Scamming Accomplice?
itunes:title: Erika Jayne: A Hustlin’ Trophy Housewife or a Scamming Accomplice?
itunes:subtitle: Why you should always read the fine print
description:
This week, we discuss the legal implications of Erika Jayne and Tom Girardi’s divorce, what it means for her, the victims… and what happens when your sugar daddy does you dirty.


Don't forget to follow us and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
